mapper.insert: INSERT INTO app_user ( mobile, photo, nike_name, sex, height, birthday, create_time ) VALUES ( #{mobile}, #{photo}, #{nikeName}, #{sex}, #{height}, #{birthday}, #{createTime} )
mapper.select:
SELECT user_id, mobile, photo, nike_name, sex, height, birthday, create_time, parent_id, remark, status FROM app_user c
c.mobile=#{mobile}

SELECT u.user_id, u.mobile, u.photo, u.nike_name, u.sex, u.height, u.birthday, u.create_time, u.parent_id, u.remark, status FROM app_user u
u.mobile LIKE concat('%',#{mobile},'%') OR u.nike_name LIKE concat('%',#{nike_name},'%')
ORDER BY u.user_id DESC
